attributes.action: Bring vulnerable syrian refugees to the UK to help them
attributes.additional_details: Vulnerable Syrian people need so much help now, it is extremely cold with so much snow around the refugee tents and children still wearing sandals. Videos of their terrible conditions are all over the news. Please do sign this petition for the UK government to bring mothers, children, elderly people and very sick people here to help them. It does not matter how many, even if it is 500 people but we need to help them.Thanks.
